name: Digital Hop
description:
A computer is going around to different areas and the only way he can do it to jump platform to platform. Will it have enough data to get through all the areas or will its programming stall?

  • Hop around platforms to get to the exit box to get to each level.
  • Each level has the player have a feeling of technology.
  • Levels includes ramps, platforms, and props full of modern technology.
  • Jumping is the only gaming mechanic.
  • Time your jumps or you have to re spawn the level.
  • Textures and 3D Models are provided from the Unity Asset Store.
